column3: Latest; PHNOM PENH – The Ministry of Health announced on the evening of March 13
column5: that there are two additional cases of COVID-19 in the capital. Phnom Penh. ------Initial reports say that one is a 49-year-old Canadian man and the other a 33-year-old Belgian man.------The men were taken to the Khmer-Soviet Friendship Hospital in Phnom Penh. ------SWIFT
